#summary How to get Traceur up and running on your machine.

= Getting Traceur =

You can pull the code down using Subversion or git (though git-svn). To get it using git-svn, do:

{{{
$ mkdir traceur # it won't create a dir for you
$ cd traceur
$ git svn clone -s https://traceur-compiler.googlecode.com/svn
}}}

I got a 205 Bad Gateway error the first time I tried that, but the second try worked. If it's working, your computer will get nice and warm and you'll see a bunch of text spew by. Once it's done, you've got it!

To see if everything works, try RunningTests
